statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT study_name, study_start_date, study_end_date FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT researcher_id, patient_id FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY study_start_date DESC;
SELECT study_name, study_start_date FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE study_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY study_end_date ASC, study_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY study_start_date DESC;
SELECT study_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved' AND researcher_id = 200;
SELECT id, study_start_date, study_end_date FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE study_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status IN ('Approved', 'Pending') AND study_start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT researcher_id) AS unique_researchers FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT id, researcher_name, research_topic, audit_trail FROM regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Patient Consent';
SELECT doc_id, document_name, timestamp FROM regulatory_compliance_documents WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research WHERE research_topic LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, SUBSTRING(audit_trail, 1, 50) AS short_audit_trail FROM regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research WHERE research_topic LIKE '%drug%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'FDA Approval' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT doc_id, document_name FROM regulatory_compliance_documents WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY doc_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT id, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulations, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE research_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM audit_trails ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT research_name, researcher_name FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE research_status IN ('ongoing', 'completed');
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT research_id, regulations FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE regulations LIKE '%FDA%';
SELECT research_name, researcher_name FROM pharmaceutical_research ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id IS NULL ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT research_id, research_name FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE research_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT drug_name, regulation_type FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date>'2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, result_description FROM research_results ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, user_id, action_taken FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY compliance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT drug_name, regulation_type FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE regulation_type = 'FDA'
SELECT researcher_name, project_name FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT result_description FROM research_results WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01'
SELECT event_id, user_id, action_taken FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT study_id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT id, study_name, responsible_person, start_date FROM study_details WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT action_timestamp, action_performed, user_id FROM audit_logs ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, role, email FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Completed';
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE study_id = 5 ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT id, study_name, responsible_person FROM study_details WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT u.username, u.role, r.action_timestamp FROM user_accounts u JOIN audit_logs r ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE r.action_performed = 'Update Study';
SELECT s.study_id, s.result_text, s.result_date FROM study_results s JOIN study_details d ON s.study_id = d.id WHERE d.responsible_person = 'John Doe';
